modName: The Joy of Perspective - Body Mod Compatibility Patch
summary: A patch to fix the problem of body parts not showing up in first-person when using The Joy of Perspective and a non-BBP body mod.
descriptionHtml:
This patch toggles the visibility of body parts in first-person mode via the Creation Kit.

The goal of this patch is to fix missing body parts when using the mod, The Joy of Perspective in conjunction with any NON-BPP/TBBP body mod. 

Make sure to load this LAST on your load order for it to work.

As this patch has only been tested by me, using UNPB, I cannot promise that it will work for everyone!


\"The Joy of Perspective\" by 3AMt
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6002/?
author: ShinZm

files.name: The Joy Of Perpective - Body Mod Compatibility Patch
